author: Zeta Ret
text: Subserver of extended Server loaded as module

public_methods.addPathListener: path*: String, callback: Function; return Function
public_methods.removePathListener: path*: String, callback*: Function; return zetaret.node.modules::Subserver
public_methods.pathListener: server*: zetaret.node.modules.Subserver, robj*: Object, routeData*: Object, request*: http.ClientRequest|http.IncomingMessage, response*: http.ServerResponse
public_methods.routeCallback: routeData*: Object, body*: String, request*: http.ClientRequest|http.IncomingMessage, response*: http.ServerResponse
public_methods.pushProtoSSResponse: request*: http.ClientRequest|http.IncomingMessage, response*: http.ServerResponse; return zetaret.node.modules::Subserver
public_methods.addHeaders: request*: http.ClientRequest|http.IncomingMessage, response*: http.ServerResponse; return Object

descriptions.routeMap: object map by route path id, if no map is extended due to new Subserver subclass, then noRouteCode and noRouteEvent will occur at all times
descriptions.codeMap: http codes based on raw path

routeCallback.this: reads response.__breakRoute to stop routing, augments route object
